TextBlock.Text: BITCHASS: This moon looks like Wher. Why does it look why Wher..?
WEIRDASS: I have no clue, but as with everything, we should probably explore some stuff. Maybe mine up the contents of this moon for metal.
KICKASS: Hey, you guys see that moon of that planet there?
KICKASS: The one with the lava orbiting that gas giant lookin' thing.
BITCHASS AND WEIRDASS: Oh yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah
KICKASS: We should go back to Wher and report to the others about it. Maybe that moon is rich in metal, considering it has lava.
BITCHASS: Great thinking, Kickass! We need to return to Wher immediately.
